```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(shiny)
library(leaflet)
library(htmlwidgets)
library(htmltools)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r eruptions, echo=FALSE}
renderLeaflet({
        df <- data.frame(lng = c(-0.136439)
                         ,lat = c(51.507359)) 
        
        df %>%
            leaflet() %>%
            addTiles() %>%
            addMarkers()
    })
```
